summary: Lake Tahoe is a big, beautiful freshwater lake in the mountains of California and Nevada. It's the largest alpine lake in North America and the second deepest in the United States. Formed millions of years ago, it's known for its clear water and mountain views. People love to visit for winter sports, summer fun, and gambling at casinos on the Nevada side. Most of the land around the lake is national forest, protected by the U.S. Forest Service.
title: Lake Tahoe
